name: T.2: B00M
description:
"H3-L0W!"

This little game is the result of a gamejam of the year 2023, with the topic:

"tic..tic..BM!"

What is your goal?

Your roboter has an unpleasing malefunction and is bound to explode in a few seconds. Can you help him to collect the mysteriouse substance from the tanks? Only this substance will keep him from exploding. But beware evil robots are trying to destroy you.

And are you able to destroy the big boss in the end?

Features

A unique self composed soundtrack

https://soundcloud.com/anjo_vi/sets/t2-b00m

Cute pixel drawings

And ... robots

Controls
